original: 本為曹操部屬。侯音與衛開南聯關羽，在南陽叛亂，曾一度挾持南陽太守東里袞。之後宗子卿勸侯因釋放東里袞，宗子卿隨後趁夜逃脫，與東里袞收聚殘兵，又會合曹仁，攻打侯因、衛開。城破後與侯因俱被誅殺。
text: Originally a subordinate of Cao Cao. Hou Yin and Wei Kai joined Guan Yu in Nanyang and rebelled in Nanyang. They once held Nanyang Prefect Dongligun. After that, Zong Ziqing persuaded Hou Yin to release Dongligun, Zong Ziqing escaped at night, gathered the remnants with Dongligun, and joined Cao Ren to attack Hou Yin and Weikai. After the city was broken, he and Hou Yin were both killed.
